languages.text: {n}Тень пробегает по лицу Ирлиэт.{/n} "Эта рана все еще кровоточит. Но ты можешь задать свои вопросы. Я отвечу как смогу".
{n}A shadow passes over Yrliet's face.{/n} "This wound is still bleeding. But you may ask your questions. I will answer to the best of my ability."
languages.original_text: {n}Тень пробегает по лицу Ирлиэт.{/n} "Эта рана все еще кровоточит. Но ты можешь задать свои вопросы. Я отвечу как смогу".

traits.locale_text: {n}A shadow runs over Yrliet's face.{/n} "This wound is still bleeding. But you may ask your questions. I will answer to the best of my ability."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特脸上掠过一道阴影。{/n}“这个伤口依然在流血，但你可以问这些问题，我会尽我所能地回答。”
languages.original_text: {n}A shadow passes over Yrliet's face.{/n} "This wound is still bleeding. But you may ask your questions. I will answer to the best of my ability."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特脸上掠过一道阴影。{/n}“这个伤口依然在流血，但你可以问这些问题，我会尽我所能地回答。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}A shadow passes over Yrliet's face.{/n} "This wound is still bleeding. But you may ask your questions. I will answer to the best of my ability."

languages.text: {n}El rostro de Yrliet se ensombrece.{/n} «La herida aún sangra, pero puedes hacer tus preguntas. Responderé tantas como pueda».
languages.original_text: {n}A shadow passes over Yrliet's face.{/n} "This wound is still bleeding. But you may ask your questions. I will answer to the best of my ability."

traits.locale_text: {n}El rostro de Yrliet se ensombrece.{/n} «La herida aún sangra, pero puedes hacer tus preguntas. Responderé tantas como pueda».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}ユリエットの表情に影が差す。{/n}「この傷はまだ血を流している。だが、質問は構わない。できる限り答えよう」
languages.original_text: {n}A shadow passes over Yrliet's face.{/n} "This wound is still bleeding. But you may ask your questions. I will answer to the best of my ability."

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットの表情に影が差す。{/n}「この傷はまだ血を流している。だが、質問は構わない。できる限り答えよう」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ein Schatten legt sich auf Yrliets Gesicht.{/n} "Diese Wunde blutet noch. Doch Ihr dürft Eure Fragen stellen. Ich werde antworten, so gut es mir möglich ist."
languages.original_text: {n}A shadow passes over Yrliet's face.{/n} "This wound is still bleeding. But you may ask your questions. I will answer to the best of my ability."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein Schatten legt sich auf Yrliets Gesicht.{/n} "Diese Wunde blutet noch. Doch Ihr dürft Eure Fragen stellen. Ich werde antworten, so gut es mir möglich ist."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Une ombre passe sur le visage d'Yrliet.{/n} « Cette plaie saigne encore, mais vous pouvez poser vos questions. Je ferai de mon mieux pour vous répondre. »
languages.original_text: {n}A shadow passes over Yrliet's face.{/n} "This wound is still bleeding. But you may ask your questions. I will answer to the best of my ability."

traits.locale_text: {n}Une ombre passe sur le visage d'Yrliet.{/n} « Cette plaie saigne encore, mais vous pouvez poser vos questions. Je ferai de mon mieux pour vous répondre. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet'in yüzünden âdeta bir gölge geçiyor.{/n} "O yara hâlâ iyileşmedi. Yine de sorularını sorabilirsin. Elimden geldiğince cevaplamaya çalışırım."
languages.original_text: {n}A shadow passes over Yrliet's face.{/n} "This wound is still bleeding. But you may ask your questions. I will answer to the best of my ability."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet'in yüzünden âdeta bir gölge geçiyor.{/n} "O yara hâlâ iyileşmedi. Yine de sorularını sorabilirsin. Elimden geldiğince cevaplamaya çalışırım."
